titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 2112) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1988 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, for the Intelligence Community Staff, for the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-126.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 285 - 115 (Record Vote No: 168).

bill.summary: 6/4/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2112 (intelligence operations funding).
